subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Porzingis scored a career-high 29 points and collected 11 rebounds, Carmelo Anthony operated as a facilitator, and the Knicks extinguished every rally that Charlotte could muster.
snippet: Porzingis scored a career-high 29 points and collected 11 rebounds, Carmelo Anthony operated as a facilitator, and the Knicks extinguished every rally that Charlotte could muster.
